title: DreamCo's Correia on NY Vote to Legalize Fantasy Sports (Audio)
itunes:title: DreamCo's Correia on NY Vote to Legalize Fantasy Sports (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Jay Correia, author of “Daily Fantasy Sports” and member of the legislative affairs committee for the Fantasy Sports Trade Association, on the impact of NY legislators voting to legalize daily fantasy sports contests.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
